search_results.query: How much was a gallon of gas during depression

snippet.title: How does Milk effect R/A I have R/A and I'm a huge milk drinker. 1/2 gallon a day 2%
snippet.description: ... I have had Phsoriatic Arthritis for 26 years. Dairy products are a large part of my diet. I drink a 1/2 gallon of 2% milk daily. I have never been told by any doctor that dairy products are bad for arthritis. Does milk cause arthritis to get worse? ...

snippet.title: How to rid of gas after the surgery?
snippet.description: ... My husband had the surgery on Dec.16th,Tuesday, he is miserable with gas and I've been trying to rub the gas out for hours. It seems to help some but every time he sips on water he builds more gas up again. The doctors just took him back off all fluid and food again. Could the morphin be causing the bowels to shut down? What would get rid of all the gas? He's been walking and I've been rubbing!!! Thanks for any help-kim ...

snippet.title: what steps can you take when your anxiety is gas that smells horrible?
snippet.description: ... I have had this terrible debilitating condition for over 20 years. It has effected every aspect of my life. I have become depressed, hopeless, and lonely. I feel like a freak how can this happen, why does this happen I ask all the time. My fathers side of the family has anxiety some smoke, some isolate themselves and some have killed themselves. Its not funny its paralizing. No one has any answers, except take meds or tell people about it share it. Who is going to understand anxiety that comes out as smelly gas. Society finds it disgusting and unexceptable. I find it disgusting and unexceptable how can do you live a normal life when no one understands or takes it seriously. People think it is something you can controll and if you do not your disgusting. I would like to know if anyone else suffers from this type of anxiety and what or if there has been anything that has helped them. ...

snippet.title: ive had belching, gas and night sweats nearly two months have been taking nexium with no relief help
snippet.description: ... i am on loette (contraception pill) and lexapro (anti depressant) I went up to 20mg 4 months ago, this is also when i changed to this pill, could this cause these symptoms? I am having scenar a tens like treatment weekly for my disc bulge in my back for about 3 months, i am trying everything from yakult, inner health, de gas, mintec, mylanta, gavison and quick ease as well as honey and cinnamon. i have had blood tests, ultra sounds, ct scans and an endoscopy, the dr's say im a mystery as the belching starts when i wake up even before i eat and continues the whole day, only easing when i lie down and am asleep. i had very low b12 which theyu found in the blood tests and i have had b12 injections to fix this. i also had a epidural steriod injection into my back mid july for my lower back. i think thats about it, any help would be so much appreciated im really struggling. thank you ...

snippet.title: Gas & chronic back pain
snippet.description: ... ... I have a new doctor and after persistenly telling her about the pain and the fact my family almost daily have to rub and press on those areas to release GAS or what i believe is gas after i can only release it by burbing it out she as informed me it sounds like FIBROMYALGIA. For all of you suffering the back pain please read the write up on this terrible condition as I am sure you will get some relief to know this could be the cause. In simple terms damaged muscles allow toxins from the body to get into these damaged areas hence causing the pain, they don't know the cause and no real cure except anti deppressants to assist the body to relax, because i am sure like me you do not sleep properly and this also is a symptom and a cause, the anti depressants help the muscles to relax and it can help. a... ...

snippet.title: Intestinal Gas Guide - Intestinal Gas Guide Symptoms - Acid Reflux Symptoms
snippet.description: ... Some people who have gas complaints suffer primarily from belching (burping), with or without a noisy stomach. Other people are more bothered by bloating or frequent passing of gas from the rectum (flatulence). ... What is your most noticeable gas problem? ... Belching (burping) or a noisy stomach Lower abdominal gas (flatulence) or bloating ...
